name: Until My Last Breath (Reboot)
description:
"Whether the stories of Achilles or Agamemnon might be true, a modern legend was heard quite frequently.

General Hassan Al Quwa was betrayed into a situation where his death was inevitable, as he was surrounded by a hundred men.

His pompous enemies, wielding a bayonet rifle, charged towards him, as they didn't want to waste any bullet on a free kill.

Even though he was denied every hope, he fought on...Until His Last Breath."

To witness this legend, you shall place yourself into the shoes of The Great General, and fight through your enemies.
